Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First, I need to analyze the event log and identify activities that appear multiple times within the same case. Looking at the log: - Case C001: Verify Documents appears twice. Once at 09:20:00 and again at 10:30:00. The context shows that the first verification was for identity documents, and the second was after the customer submitted additional documents. So, the meaning is different: first verification is initial, second is re-verification after submission.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Case C002: Call Customer appears twice. Once at 09:00:00 and again at 09:50:00. The first call is to clarify an account discrepancy, and the second is a follow-up to confirm adjustments. So, different purposes: first for clarification, second for confirmation.

Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Case C003: Verify Documents appears twice. First at 11:25:00 and again at 12:20:00. The first is physical verification of ID, and the second is re-verification after account adjustment.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Now, from the log: Activities that recur within a case: - Verify Documents in C001 and C003. - Call Customer in C002. I need to interpret the meaning based on context.

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For Verify Documents: First occurrence: In C001 at 09:20:00, it is checks identity documents initially. Second occurrence in C001 at 10:30:00, it is re-checks documents now that ID scan is provided – so it is after customer action. Similarly in C003: First at 11:25:00: Physical verification of ID. Second at 12:20:00: Re-verify docs after account adjustment. So, the second verification is a follow-up after some action (customer submission or account adjustment).

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: For Call Customer: In C002: First call at 09:00:00: Outbound call to clarify account discrepancy – to resolve an issue. Second call at 09:50:00: Follow-up call to confirm adjustments made – to confirm resolution. Different purposes: clarification vs confirmation.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: Propose new names: For Verify Documents: First occurrence: Initial Document Verification. Second occurrence: Re-verification of Documents or Follow-up Verification. In C001, after customer submission; in C003, after account adjustment. So, a common term might be Follow-up Document Verification or Re-verification.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For Call Customer: First call: Clarification Call. Second call: Confirmation Call.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: In C002, Verify Documents appears only once, so no rename. Call Customer recurs only in C002. In C001 and C003, Call Customer once each, so leave as is. Other activities do not recur within cases.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: Present revised log with renamed activities only where they recur, keep others same. Justification: Rename based on position and context to disambiguate.
